lead_paragraph: BRILL--Betty, born April 17, 1921, died April 28, 2014. Wife of the late Martin Brill. Survived by her sons Walter, Peter, and Steven; daughters-in-law Gerrilyn, Krista, and Elaine; grandchildren Rachel, Natalie, David, and Lauren. Betty lived a wonderful life for an extraordinary 93 years. She was a lover of New York culture, travel, and most of all family and friends. All of them will miss her dearly, will cherish their precious memories of love and laughter, and forever remember her spirit of always caring for others.
